projects.name: Shopperz
projects.description: Engineered a full-stack website using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) enabling users to post and read e-commerce product reviews, receive notifications about the latest tech news, and browse a dedicated products section. Implemented user authentication, dynamic content rendering, and responsive design to enhance user experience.

projects.name: Food Recognition System using Deep Learning
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to recognize various Indian food items using a dataset of 25,000+ images. Studied and worked about deep learning and Convolutional Neural Networks. Built and tested the model using Convolutional Neural Network algorithms with architectures like VGG16, VGG19, ResNet50, and ResNet100.

projects.name: Library Management System
projects.description: Designed and developed a library management system interface using C++, applying Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) concepts to streamline library operations and improve management efficiency.

experiences.description: Collaborated with a mathematics professor to apply mathematical principles in machine learning, specifically focusing on regression algorithms. Conducted an in-depth analysis of regression algorithms, elucidating their mathematical foundations and implementing practical applications, resulting in prediction accuracy.

full_output.name: Chaitanya Nath Gaddam
interests: Actively participate in discussions and forums related to geopolitics, analyzing global events and their socio-political implications.
achievements_and_awards: Certified Cyber Volunteer Level 2 by AP CID: Participated in a one-week workshop on cyber security awareness hosted by CID headquarters, acquiring advanced knowledge in cyber security measures and practices.
